grade_comment:
Grade: 95

Comment: The response provides a comprehensive and insightful explanation of the significance of the sending of the apostles by Jesus in the context of the Great Commission. It effectively connects the mission of the apostles to the broader theological implications of fulfilling God's plan of salvation and establishing the early Christian church. The response demonstrates a thorough understanding of the role of apostleship in spreading the gospel message and carrying out the authority granted by Jesus. Well done!
